channel.title: Posts on Neal's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Neal's blog

item.title: A New Post, A New Era
item.description: Been a while don’t it? I am creating this post to summarise, in brief, about what’s happened. 11 months ago, I stopped using this, for, then, I acquired a new thing to play with, Minecraft Betas, this is where the story starts. I loved Minecraft Betas, they were full of new features which I could try early on, it was fun. Eventually, after playing countless hours on these Betas, I acquired yet another thing to play with, Minecraft PvP servers.

item.title: The Summer Break Is Over
item.description: Now that the summer break is over, our school is giving us tutorials again; As of this date tomorrow is going be our first day of school after vacation. Well, school is still online but the only thing that is big, different and better from last time, is that we are going to use Meet, Google Meet. I have been waiting for our school to switch to Meet for ages now and during the vacation, BOOM, google launches free meetings with g!

item.title: Difference Between Types Of Blogs
item.description: Difference between online and offline blogs. Offline Blogs Online Blogs These blogs can be posted whenever internet connectivity is available. These blogs are actively managed and updated, thus requiring continuous internet access. These blogs are created with a Offline Blog Editor. These blogs can be created online. This was task 2 of our IT Project.

item.title: The Virtual Experience
item.description: The World of Virtual Connections Days have passed and the world has been moving towards virtual connections, proving that humanity can still educate, entertain and nourish themselves from afar. When we had our first virtual class, I was very excited, using IT to study sounded awesome. So, I joined my first meeting the day, it was our Vice Principal’s meeting and I had anticipated this to be great. So far it went great, a few people were not able to connect but everything went quite smoothly and we managed to learn stuff over the internet.

item.title: Day1 of Covid
item.description: Hello Folks This is the post where I describe the first day of lockdown. Lets get started. So, during the first few days of the start of the pandemic, I was still gathering information, everything seemed random and I did not acknowledge the cause yet. So I started digging and found the origin, China. I am not actually blaming China for this but this where hell began. Wuhan has a wet market which sell fresh slaughters and one of the Pangolins in the market caught the pathogen through a bat.
